dict.string: • The Search Widget can be invoked via Activator or it can be pinned to the Homescreen.
• Touch and drag to move it anywhere on the screen, and hold the google icon to center it to the middle of the screen.
• Tap on the search field to bring up the keyboard, and type what you want to search in Google.
• Press the "Search" key on the keyboard to open your search results in a custom web browser.
• The bottom toolbar of the web browser provides buttons to go back, go forward, go to the Google homepage, open in Safari, and close the web browser.
• To resize the web browser, drag any corner of the browser until it fits your needs, then pinch in the middle of the web view to resize the inside.
• When the editing handles (white tiny circles) are showing you can drag the browser anywhere on the screen, tap on it again to dismiss the handles.
• Pressing the microphone icon will activate Siri, if you have text in the text field it will send that string to Siri so he/she can respond to it.
